column1: Kata Robata////Awesome food and awesome service!!! We had the hamachi jalape√±o dish and that was amazing. We also did the 11pc sushi combo and we loved the selection. The BEST dish we got was the Texas Beef skewers (robata)
column2: the meat was very tender and flavorful. We also had the dessert: green tea cake and the strawberry cake. All of our dishes was delicious. The prices were a bit high but definitely worth every penny!
